definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: But the individual differences or character traits do not get a bearing on the topic problem (Daschmann & Kepplinger 1997).
sentences.chinese: 但是個體的差異和個體性格特點並不阻礙主旨。

sentences.english: It is the theme of this book.
On Tuesday 23 May the keynote speaker will be His Royal Highness, The Prince of Wales.
sentences.chinese: 5月23日星期二的主旨發言人是威爾士親王殿下。

sentences.english: As is known to all, the keynote of the Peony Pavilion is love.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，《牡丹亭》的主旨是寫“情”。

sentences.english: And hope is what Yad Vashem is all about!
sentences.chinese: 而盼望正是大屠殺紀念館的主旨。

sentences.english: The main idea is the people are more important than the kings.
sentences.chinese: 民貴君輕，民心向背是儒家民本思想的主旨。
這種感覺的主旨是什麼？

sentences.english: Their "standing in the spirit of Mexico" was the main thrust of future generations widely famous.
sentences.chinese: 其“墨海中立定精神”的主旨被後人廣爲傳頌。

sentences.english: The aim of this paper is to make a comparative study of the reflexive pronouns in Mandarin Chinese and English.
sentences.chinese: 本論文主旨在在比較漢語和英語中的反身代名詞。

sentences.english: One of our themes is to lower the barriers to entry.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個主旨，就是降低入門的門坎。

sentences.english: This last event, which almost concludes the book, is its leitmotif.
sentences.chinese: 而這最後一次正是本書的主旨所在。

sentences.english: This is what test-first development is all about.
sentences.chinese: 這就是測試優先的開發的主旨所在。

sentences.english: Amid warm applause Wu Bangguo started his 20-minute keynote speech.
sentences.chinese: 在熱烈的掌聲中，吳邦國開始了20分鐘的主旨演講。

sentences.english: Many people use it to make chairs, tables, curtains, birdcages and so on.
sentences.chinese: 第一句是主旨句，說竹有許多用途。

sentences.english: Chen Xujing advocates total westernization, aiming at Chinas modernization.
sentences.chinese: 但他提出全盤西化的主旨是希望中國實現現代化。

sentences.english: Vice President Li Yuanchao is invited to attend and address the opening ceremony of the fourth World Peace Forum on June 27.
sentences.chinese: 日出席第四屆世界和平論壇開幕式並發表主旨演講。

definition: start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
to bring out the main theme/to make the point/to bring out the substance concisely
place of interest/a place one has one's eye on
the gist (of a text or argument)/the main points
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
